1. These Regulations may be cited as the Seanad Electoral (University 

Members) (Prescribed Matters) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 268 of 2024)),
heading: 2. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed Matters)
text_raw:
2. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed Matters) 
Regulations 1938 to 2019 and these Regulations shall be construed as one and 
may be cited together as the Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed 
Matters) Regulations 1938 to 2024.
text_norm: 2 seanad electoral (university members) (prescribed matters) regulation 1938 2019 regulation shall construed one may cited together seanad electoral (university members) (prescribed matters) regulation 1938 2024

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 268 of 2024)),
heading: 3. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed Matters)
text_raw:
3. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed Matters) 
Regulations 1938 are amended by substituting form EU1 in Part 1 of the 
Schedule hereto for form EU1 in the Schedule to the said Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 3 

FORM EU 1 

Section 16 

Schedule 

Part 1 

FORM OF NOMINATION 

We, the undersigned, A.B. of _________________ in the _________________ 
of _________________ 
the 
_________________ of _________________ being registered electors of the 
constituency of _________________ do hereby nominate the following person 
to serve in Seanad Éireann as a member for the said constituency. 

and C.D. of _________________ 

in 

Surname 

Other names 

Address 

Rank, Profession 
or Occupation 

Photographs attached for inclusion 
on ballot paper (see note below). 

Yes 

No 

(Signature) A.B. 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters: 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) C.D. 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

We, the undersigned, being registered electors for the constituency of 
___________________ do hereby assent to the nomination of the abovementioned ___________________ as a proper person to serve as a member for 
the said constituency. 

(Signature) E.F. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters: 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) G.H. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) I.J. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [409] 

(Signature) K.L. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) M.N. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) O.P. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) Q.R. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

(Signature) S.T. of 

________________________________________ 

Name in capital letters 

________________________________________ 

Note 

Section 56(d) of the Electoral (Amendment) Act 2001 amended section 20 of the 
Seanad Electoral (University Members) Act 1937 to allow for the inclusion of a 
photograph of the candidate on the ballot paper in a Seanad election. The Seanad 
Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed Matters) (Amendment) Regulations 
2002, as amended by the Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Prescribed 
Matters) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 set out the required specification of a 
photograph for inclusion on a ballot paper. 

If a candidate wishes to have his or her photograph included on the ballot paper, 
they must provide with the nomination paper: 

• 

• 

A photograph in digitised format (passport size – 35mm x 
45mm); AND 

Two identical printed copies of the photograph. 

The photograph must be taken not more than 12 months prior to the day for the 
closing of the poll and must be of good quality, in colour and taken to a 
professional standard, showing the candidate’s full face, head and shoulders 
only, on a light background (any colour). 

Each printed copy of the photograph must have the candidate’s name clearly 
shown on the back. 

If the above requirements are not complied with, the returning officer may not 
include the photograph on the ballot paper. In these circumstances, or if no 
photograph is supplied, the space for the candidate’s photograph will be left 
blank on the ballot paper. 

THE ONUS IS ON THE CANDIDATE TO MEET THESE REQUIREMENTS. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 5 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 12 August 2024 

MALCOLM NOONAN 
 Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 

Government and Heritage 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [409]

35mm x 45mm) two identical printed copy photograph photograph must taken 12 month prior day closing poll must good quality colour taken professional standard showing candidate full face head shoulder light background (any colour) printed copy photograph must candidate name clearly shown back requirement complied returning officer may include photograph ballot paper circumstance photograph supplied space candidate photograph left blank ballot paper onus candidate meet requirement 409 5 given hand 12 august 2024 malcolm noonan minister state department housing local government heritage 6 409

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 268 of 2024)),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations provide for a revised form for nominating University Member 
candidates at Seanad elections. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 7 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6

r-phost: publications@opw.ie
